caption:
The best social teams aren’t just posting—they’re driving business impact.

A newly commissioned Total Economic Impact™ study of Sprout Social by Forrester Consulting shows just how much social teams stand to gain:

– 80% less time spent on reporting—turning two-day processes into an hour 📉 
– $128K saved on influencer discovery & management 💰 
– 60% of team time freed up for publishing, campaign planning & more ⏳

And the biggest number? A 268% ROI over three years.

For social teams, efficiency isn’t just about moving faster—it’s about unlocking more impact across the business. The right platform doesn’t just streamline workflows—it makes social a true growth engine.

See the full breakdown at our #LinkInBio.
